name: Moth
description:
Moth is a short, free to play, rhythm game, set in the smallest part of our world! Run a course of a series of platforms while avoiding deadly spikes as you travel through the undergrowth as a little moth, determined to find your prize at the end!

Run, jump, and fall to the beat of the music! and remember...

keep your reflexes up! or you might just end up stuck in a loop forever...

For any questions or feedback about Moth, please email: aliteralbranch@gmail.com or tweet @branch_uwu

**All music used in this project is licensed under Creative Commons and Public Domain**
